alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:54PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Harris County through 730 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deer Park, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Baytown, La Porte, Deer Park, South Houston, Galena Park, Cloverleaf, Channelview, northern South Belt / Ellington, Highlands, northern Clear Lake, Shoreacres, Morgan`s Point, Edgebrook Area, Houston Ship Channel, San Jacinto State Park, Northshore and Ellington Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
